text:
The foreign workers basic things in Singapore is work and then take a rest & sleep in dormitory when we done the hard works.But this and some other dormitories are not keep good hygine in
the toilets and wash rooms.please do good inspections and make clean.Because we suffer for medical & mental health issues.please be consider everyone is human being we also came for work and we proud one of giving a hand to make singapore.

Really bad experience with the office staff, the sites is not hygiene and bad condition.

Anyhow charge the fees.

Bad customer service support, not advise send your workers stay there.
There is no public transportation near by this dorm, except that they provide all necessary facilities including gym, kitchen, resting areas, spacious room
Nice place near the sea shore view. Only the public transport can't reach the dorm. Walk to the nearest LRT

Very worst Dormitory in singapore, poor maintenance, toilet and urinal all leaking and very bad smelly, Really very worst hygiene and poor housekeeping, I don't want to share photos because If you look at that photo, there is a possibility of vomiting
